column4: i've installed  any other distro over ubuntu. now it's grub loader is overwritten by  a new grub loader of new distro. though i can the ubuntut option, but on entring it say's "load kernal first". ... i don't know what to do now..any help would be great.. :D
here is my grub.cfg file: http://pastebin.org/241853

i've installed  any other distro over ubuntu. now it's grub loader is overwritten by  a new grub loader of new distro. though i can the ubuntut option, but on entring it say's "load kernal first". ... i don't know what to do now..any help would be great.. :Dhttp://pastebin.org/241853v
that's normal.. whatever you install last is what writes grub.. ubuttu will give you a link to fix it
